caption.p: P2X 1 receptor currents of wild-type ( a), N3-mutated subunits activated by different ATP-concentrations ( b), ATP dose-response curves for wild-type and mutant ∆N3, respectively ( c). The bar graph shows the amount of current measured at 0.3 µM relative to the maximal current at 30 µM; it demonstrates that all mutants lacking the N-glycan at position N3 exhibit lower affinity for ATP ( d)
